name: Spaceflower
description:
A small seed finds itself on a strange planet and tries to escape. 'Where to?' you ask? Up, of course! But where is 'up' in space? 

Try growing as far as you can and avoid space debris on your way to the top, while fighting agains the ever growing speed of your own motion.

How far can you go?

Credits:

  • Katharina Broswik - 2D Art, Code, Game Design
  • Nic Schilling - Music, Sound Effects
